subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Weather permitting, Andre Agassi will have his next chance to postpone retirement Thursday night against Marcos Baghdatis, a young, shaggy-haired, flat-hitting crowd favorite.
snippet: Weather permitting, Andre Agassi will have his next chance to postpone retirement Thursday night against Marcos Baghdatis, a young, shaggy-haired, flat-hitting crowd favorite.
